replies.user_restaurant_book_ask_restaurant_book: I would like to make a reservation at a restaurant
replies.ask_name: May I have your name, please?
replies.restaurant_ask_restaurant: What restaurant would you like to go to?
replies.user_restaurant_book_inform_restaurant_n: The name of the restaurant is [RESTAURANT_NAME]
replies.restaurant_ask_time: For what time should the reservation be made?
replies.restaurant_ask_size: For how many people should the reservation be made?
replies.restaurant_inform_unavailable: I am sorry, but it looks like the restaurant is not able to accomodate you.
replies.restaurant_ask_confirm_booking:
Great, the {restaurant_name:s} is happy to accommodate you.
Can I confirm your reservation with them?
replies.db_restaurant_inform_booking_successful: [RESULT] APIName = restaurant_book ; ReservationStatus = Reservation Confirmed ; RestaurantName = [RESTAURANT_NAME] ;
replies.restaurant_inform_booking_successful: Excellent, your reservation at the {restaurant_name:s} is confirmed!
replies.db_restaurant_inform_booking_failed: [RESULT] APIName = restaurant_book ; ReservationStatus = Reservation Failed ; RestaurantName = [RESTAURANT_NAME] ;
replies.restaurant_inform_booking_failed: I am sorry, but the reservation request was not successful.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.restaurant_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no restaurants that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with restaurant reservations.
